entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 06:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
